entry.title: The role of corporations in advancing humanitarian efforts

media:group.media:title: The role of corporations in advancing humanitarian efforts
media:group.media:description:
The Aurora Humanitarian Initiative, in partnership with UCLAโs Promise Institute for Human Rights, hosted a discussion on โThe Role of Corporations in Advancing Humanitarian Efforts.โ This program was part of the Human Rights and Humanitarian Forum which took place in Los Angeles in May. The event brought together leaders from the corporate sector to discuss how businesses can play a crucial role in addressing some of the worldโs most pressing humanitarian challenges. Featuring perspectives from David Goel, Alex Gorsky, Vincent Roche, and Noubar Afeyan, this conversation emphasizes the need for innovative solutions, compassionate leadership, and effective partnerships to create meaningful change.
Partner content.

entry.title: Most Armenians want to be part of EU, survey finds

media:group.media:title: Most Armenians want to be part of EU, survey finds
media:group.media:description:
๐ Two Armenian servicemen were detained on charges of driving fellow soldier to suicide. ๐ Armenian Foreign Minister Ararat Mirzoyan emphasized Armenia's focus on regional cooperation at a regional ministerial meeting in Istanbul. ๐ Most Armenians believe the country needs to sign a peace treaty with Azerbaijan and would also vote in favor of joining the European Union at a referendum, according to a recent survey. ๐ Armenia faces transparency concerns in ECHR judge selection: civilnet.am/en/news/801580/armenia-faces-transparency-concerns-in-echr-judge-selection/

Mantashyants Global EXPO 2024-ีจ ีีกีถีฉีกีทีตีกีถึ ีฃีธึีฎีกึีกึีถีฅึีซ ีดีซีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีกีถีคีกีดีถีฅึีซ ีขีซีฆีถีฅีฝีถีฅึีจ ีดีฅีฏ ีฐีกึีฉีกีฏีธึีด ีถีฅึีฏีกีตีกึีถีธีฒ ึีธึึีกีฐีกีถีคีฅีฝ ีงึ ีีก ีถีดีกีถ ีกีผีกีปีซีถ ึีธึึีกีฐีกีถีคีฅีฝีถ ีง ึ ีฏีฃีธึีฎีซ ีฐีธีฏีฟีฅีดีขีฅึีซ 18-ีซีถ ีธึ 19-ีซีถ ยซีีฅึีซีคีซีกีถยป ึีธึึีกีฐีกีถีคีฅีฝีกีตีซีถ ีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถีธึีดึ ิณีธึีฎีกึีกึีถีฅึีจ ีฏีกึีธีฒ ีฅีถ ีฎีกีถีธีฉีกีถีกีฌ ีดีซีดีตีกีถึ ีขีซีฆีถีฅีฝีถีฅึีซีถ, ีฟีฅีฒีฅีฏีกีถีกีฌ ีตีธึึีกึีกีถีนีตีธึึ ีขีซีฆีถีฅีฝีซ ีกีผีกีถีฑีถีกีฐีกีฟีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซีถ ึ ีฐีถีกึีกีพีธึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซีถึ

ยซินีฅีฌ-ีีฅีฌยป ีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ 1,5 ีดีฌึีค ีคึีกีดีซ ีถีฅึีคึีธึีด ีง ีกีถีธึีด ีฐีกีถึีกีตีซีถ ีฟึีกีถีฝีบีธึีฟีซ ีดีซีกีฝีถีกีฏีกีถ ีฟีธีดีฝีกีตีซีถ ีฐีกีดีกีฏีกึีฃีธึีด, ีถีทีธึีด ีง ยซินีฅีฌ-ีีฅีฌยป ีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฃีฌีญีกีพีธึ ีฟีถึ ึีฅีถีซ ีฟีฅีฒีกีฏีกีฌ ิผีซีกีถีก ีีธึีถีกีถีตีกีถีจ ยซีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉ ีขีซีฆีถีฅีฝีซยป ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด: ีีกึึีกีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด ิผีซีกีถีก ีีธึีถีกีถีตีกีถีจ ีบีกีฟีดีธึีด ีง ีฐีกีถึีกีตีซีถ ีฟึีกีถีฝีบีธึีฟีซ ีฐีกีดีกีฏีกึีฃีธึีด ีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีถีฅึีคึีดีกีถ ีทีกึีชีกีผีซีฉีถีฅึีซ ึ ีกีบีกีฃีก ีฎึีกีฃึีฅึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถ:

media:group.media:title: Vanazdorโs industrial past
media:group.media:description:
Nestled in the mountains of northern Armenia is Vanadzor - the countryโs third largest city and the heart of the Lori region. The city was the central hub of Armenian industrial manufacturing during the Soviet Union.
To honor this heritage, Mit Mission held a 3 day event in Vanadzor. The program included various speakers and hands-on workshops.
